resources.string: If you are in need of blood, fill the following and click \'Send Message\'.This message will reach to all users of this app whose blood group will match the blood group u entered just now.
You can turn off notifications if you don\'t to receive any messages related to \'Plea for blood\' from the one who needs blood.
Cardamom has a strong, unique taste, with an intensely aromatic, resinous fragrance. It helps curing poor digestion, gas and bloating.
Coriander helps in the proper secretion of enzymes and digestive juices in the stomach thus enhances digestion and peristaltic motion.
Lemon grass is a mild diuretic and a digestive stimulant that promotes digestion of fats.
Black pepper has an expectorant property that helps to break up the mucus and phlegm depositions in the respiratory tract.
Peppermint oil and peppermint tea have been used to sort out a variety of digestive and gastrointestinal conditions.
Blackberries are a source of both insoluble and soluble fiber essential for the optimum functioning of digestive system.
The lemon juice present in lemon water promotes the production of hydrochloric acid and bile secretion required for digestion.
Chrysanthemum is a cooling herb helping to remove excess heat from the body thus helps a lot during fever.
The miraculous healing properties of tulsi come mainly from its essential oils and the phytonutrients contained in it.
Ecalyptus protect the body from a wide variety of bacterial infections and boosts up the immune system.
Aloe-vera works as an anti-inflammatory, decreasing redness and swelling. It also has antibacterial properties.
Orange peels possess vitamin C and citric acid. It has also astringent properties thats helps to reduce pimples.
Ginger can be helpful in treating common cold and its symptoms due to its antiviral, expectorant, and anti-inflammatory properties.
Garlic is good for the immune system and helps open up respiratory passages, and also helps flush toxins out of your body.
In addition to being antioxidant rich, tomatoes have a high level of acidity inherent in their juice which is good for skin.
Eat raw ginger or drink ginger tea several times a day. For enhance the effectiveness of ginger tea, add a lemon juice and honey to it.
Remove the outer pods and grind the seeds coarsely for tea. Use 1 teaspoon of seeds per 1 cup of water for tea.
Grind the seeds just before preparing its tea. You can eat its leaves along with honey making a slurry paste.
Infuse a few teaspoons of dried and chopped stalks in each cup of water. Serve hot or cold with lemon slices.
Grind the seeds and mix a pinch of it with a teaspoon of honey to eat. You can also add it in tea and drink.
Make tea using few leaves of peppermint. You can add both salt and sugar in it which significantly helps to reduce diarrhoea.
You can prepare tea using its roots and leaves or syrup using its fruits that reduces diarrhoea and dysentery.
Mix sugar and salt thoroughly in water and squeeze a half cut lemon and drink it to prevent dehydration.
Boil the chrysanthemum flowers gently in hot water for no more than 10 minutes in a closed vessel and drink.
Boil few leaves of tulsi adding some salt and drink. You can also eat its leaves directly or with honey and ginger.
Grind the dry leaves of ecalyptus and add a tablespoon of it in boiled water and drink. You can also add honey on it.
Wash your face with water and pat dry. Using your fingertips, apply the aloe directly to your problem areas.
Grind up your orange peels and add a little water to create a paste. Apply it on ur face and wait for 20 to 25 minutes and wash.
You can eat raw garlic or use a few drops of garlic oil in your food and drinks. Consume this daily until the symptoms subside.
Massage the tomato juice into the skin for a few seconds after application, and then you simply rinse it off with warm water.
Here You can find home remedies for common diseases. You just have to swipe left-side of screen to draw the Drawer with the list of provided common diseases. Be Healthy! Enjoy Healthy Life!
Let\'s know what this app does and have a tour through some of its amazing features.
You can ask experts about your health problems and you can get reply accordingly from well known experts.
When you are in need of blood of any group, you can use this feature for asking help for blood donation to other users of this app.
You enjoy reading daily health tips? That\'s what this feature is for; providing daily health tips.
You can know many things about your body and other health related topics by playing this quiz.
Do you forget taking medicines in right time? No problem we will remind you through this feature.
Don\'t you want to know about herbal remedies for your common diseases? That\'s what this feature helps you to do.
Is your weight normal? This feature will find it out for you and of course many more.
